awd_titl_txt: Simulation of the National Economy for Macroeconomics       Classes
awd_abstract_narration: This project provides a computer lab for students which will                    enable them to experience the impact on the national economy of                 various changes in national policy.  The Department of Economics                at the University of Wisconsin Oshkosh is extending its strategy                of providing computer simulations of economics in its core                      courses to its macro principles and intermediate macro theory                   sections.  Using a high quality spreadsheet and the fine                        resolution of the Apple Macintosh computer, student imputed                     changes impact the simulated economy.  The software and                         department-developed templates provide an easy way for students                 to record both the numerical impact and graphic illustration of                 their policy changes.
